name: Antheal
description:
The ant queen took well deserved vacations and entrusted the anthill to her children, however, a giant human foot fell onto the anthill in the mean time and now it is up to you and your fellow ants to help repair the anthill before the queen comes back. Gather food from the ground and take it back to the anthill as fast as possible so the repair workers have more energy to keep going, use many ants to drag large food faster, split your team to drag the food while dragging obstacles out of your way, plan the best teamwork strategy to be as efficient as possible.

To play just run the linux executable by double clicking on it (Linux OS needed).

Plug a controller to play, use the left stick to move and button A (the bottom one) to carry objects. Sorry that it is hard to run and play

An entry for the 2020 Global Game Jam. Developed at GIGASEDE México, Centro de Cultura Digital, Complejo Cultural Los Pinos. Made with friends from Golden Pie Studio and Victor, an awesome music composer that joined us.
